Howard Murphy (January 1, 1882 â€“ October 5, 1926)  was a Major League Baseball outfielder. He played in 25 games for the St. Louis Cardinals in . His minor league baseball career spanned sixteen seasons, from  until . After his playing career, Murphy served as head baseball coach at Decatur Baptist College.
